CustomField.formula: IF(AND(CONTAINS(Text(Type), "Carrier Submission"),(OR(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name , "Benefits Change Case"), CONTAINS(RecordType.Name , "Benefits Renewal Case")))),true,IF(AND(NOT(CONTAINS(Text(Type), "Carrier Submission")),OR(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name , "Benefits Change Case"),CONTAINS(RecordType.Name , "Benefits Renewal Case"))),true,false))
CustomField.label: Temp Case Automation Rule
